title: HOUR 1 - Raiders, Jimmy G, NIL
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Raiders, Jimmy G, NIL
description:
The NFL was right letting the Raiders move to Las Vegas

Jimmy Garoppolo would be a great fit for the Giants

NIL is not causing a class system in college football

 

Guest: Albert Breer
